category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Man Golfing, Type-4 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Golfer, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-4, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16  http://emojipedia.org/man-golfing-type-4/
name: man golfing: medium skin tone
note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: The man golfing emoji on Apple devices showcases a dynamic figure with a medium skin tone, captured mid-swing with a clean, polished golf club. Apple's characteristic 3D shading gives the scene a sense of action and depth, with the character's posture conveying focus and athleticism. This emoji on Apple devices is ideal for communicating sports, leisure activities, or a feeling of achievement after a successful endeavor.
